params._token: Address of the ERC20 contract to use in the asset pool.

deposit(uint256).details: Make sure a transfer for the given amount is approved before calling.

params._amount: Deposit amount to transfer to the pool.

returns._0: pool token balance for the asset pool
address of the registry contract of the asset pool.
address of the ERC20 contract used in the asset pool.

setPoolRegistry(address).details: Registry contains general pool settings and will be governable at some point.

deposit(uint256).notice: Calculates the deposit fee over the amount and substracts of the total. Fee is transfered to FeeCollector address as stored in the registry.

setPoolRegistry(address).notice: Sets registry address for the asset pool.
